item.description:
Saturday, Jan 19, 10:00 am to 12:00 pm, Wethersfield. Meet Larry Lunden at 258 Elm St, at the underpass under I-91. A long hike to our Wolcott and Crilly parcels in the Wethersfield Meadows. Maybe Bacon or Woodhouse also.
From I-91 south take exit 25 S to route 3 south, or from Glastonbury take route 3 south over the Putnam Bridge. Go past the first traffic light, make a U turn and come back to this traffic light. Turn right onto Elm St and park at the highway underpass.

Dress for the Weather and ground conditions. Many places will be muddy. Weather and water conditions may revise or cancel. This area is used for hunting, so wear an orange vest if you have one. Call the CT Audubon Society for the latest information, 860-633-8402. Free.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Winter Walk Elm St
